Header.title: TARORA REJUVENATION
Header.paragraph: Realize the skin of your dreams

paragraph: At Tarora Rejuvenation we pride ourselves in making you look the best you’ve ever been, to enhance your natural beauty and embrace your inner diva.
Our commitment to you is to ensure a seamless, painless and swift rejuvenation to the best look you’ve ever had.
ourmission: At Tarora Rejuvenation, our mission is to empower individuals to embrace their unique beauty through innovative and science-based aesthetic treatments.
We are committed to providing a warm, welcoming environment where client education and personalized care are our top priorities.
Our expert team strives to enhance self-confidence and well-being by delivering exceptional results with the latest technologies and techniques to create the beauty you’ve always wanted.
Together, we aim to inspire a radiant rejuvenation that lasts.
founder: I am Meena Bagga, the founder and proprietor of Tarora Rejuvenation.
With an extensive background spanning over two decades in the beauty and wellness industry, I am deeply committed to the pursuit of enhancing the skin's health and radiance for our valued clientele.
At the heart of my practice lies an unwavering dedication to providing top-tier services that prioritize quality, ensuring each client's comfort and leaving them feeling truly beautiful.
We take pride in offering a range of medical-grade products and services, meticulously designed to inspire confidence and rejuvenation.
We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you soon to Tarora Rejuvenation.

Team.name: Meena
Team.bio: As the founder of Tarora Rejuvenation, Meena brings with her decades of experience around the aesthetics and medical industry as she has always been around professionals. She brings great insight and compassion in what she does, ensuring everyone is well taken care of and is delightful and satisfied with their experience.

Team.name: Tarannum
Team.bio: As the general manager of Tarora Rejuvenation Tarannum is currently in the final stages of finishing her medical degree & has been working with medical professionals for over 5 years. She continually strives forward and keeps her knowledge up to date with the cutting edge advancements in the medical-aesthetics field to ensure everything she does exceeds the current Aesesthics medical standard.

Team.name: Jordon
Team.bio: As a leading Clinical Esthetician of Tarora Rejuvenation, Jordan has over 5 years in the beauty industry and has the know-how's of many different procedures and treatments. She provides top of the line recommendations with various solutions so you are always informed and can make the best possible decision to look as stunning as possible.

Team.name: Rahab
Team.bio: As the Premier registered nurse of Tarora Rejuvenation, Rahab brings extensive medical and Aesthetical experience to the field, With over 10 years of experience as a nurse, and over 5 years as an injector; she strives to make the beauty process as relaxing as possible while making you look astonishingly captivating.

Contact.address: 50 Nolanridge Ct NW #140, Calgary, AB T3R 1W7
